name: Magic Machine Gun
description:
Battle

A large number of enemies are attacking you, while ensuring survival, try to kill as many enemies as possible.

Relic

Upgrading gives you a chance to choose relics, and each upgrade randomly generates 5 different relics. Choose a unique combination of relics to make your character stronger

Upgrade

Use the gold coins obtained from each game to purchase enhancements, and the enhanced attributes will take effect in new battles. You can reset the enhancement at any time and switch to a different upgrade route
